<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-20 01:32:48" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value=" " type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2017-05-09 16:17:23" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION" value="27:4630212" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:STEAM_API_GAME_VERSION_UPDATE" value="2019-06-13 09:01:48" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

 </CustomDataSourceItem>

</ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilterType" value="Files" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemFilter" value="dod/maps/*.bsp" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemExcludeFilter" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemIncludeSubDirectories" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemValue" value="FileNameNoExtension" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="FileSystemItemDisplay" value="FileNameNoExtension" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_variables_config.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="MinValue" value="66" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxValue" value="1000" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="MaxLength" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalDigits" value="0" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="DecimalSeparator" value="." type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSeparator" value="," type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="GroupSizes" value="3" type="System.Double,mscorlib" /> <add key="NegativePattern" value="-n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="PositivePattern" value="n" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="ShowSpinButtons" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_variables_config.description: Adjusts the frames per second that the server will process.
